job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an AI Engineer at Carv, you will take a hands-on approach in developing and optimizing AI systems that transform candidate and hiring manager interactions, enhance workflow efficiency, and support seamless integration with applicant tracking systems (ATS). Leveraging tools like Python, Langchain and Langsmith, you'll build and refine scalable, reliable data pipelines and AI-driven solutions for our recruitment tech platform. Enhancing our AI capabilities, from data processing to document generation, while ensuring system robustness across diverse user scenarios., * AI Pipeline Development
          + Design and enhance AI pipelines to automatically extract and format output documents and structured data compatible with external systems.
          + Research new data extraction techniques to improve accuracy and automate data capture from various input documents.
          + Collaborate with integration teams to ensure smooth and reliable data transfer to ATS and other connected systems.
     * System Optimization for AI Stability and Robustness
          + Analyze and improve the underlying AI setup to enhance stability, adaptability, and overall output quality for diverse customer use cases.
          + Identify and address potential issues, especially regarding input variability, to maintain high system resilience.
          + Implement continuous testing and monitoring practices to optimize system performance and ensure reliable output generation.
     * Prompt Engineering for Customer Output
          + Develop and refine AI prompt templates to generate output documents in customer-specific formats, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
          + Work closely with product and engineering teams to optimize prompts for specific customer document standards.
          + Conduct testing and iterate on prompt designs to reduce manual adjustments and improve output quality.
     * Research and development
          + Lead R&D initiatives to advance Carv's AI capabilities, with a focus on emerging applications, including candidate engagement and workflow automation.
          + Explore new techniques and technologies that could improve or expand Carv's product offerings, from interaction-driven AI to predictive modeling.
          + Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prototype, test, and iterate on new AI-driven features that support both current and future customer needs.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

As an AI Engineer at Carv, you will take a hands-on approach in developing and optimizing AI systems that transform candidate and hiring manager interactions, enhance workflow efficiency, and support seamless integration with applicant tracking systems (ATS). Leveraging tools like Python, Langchain and Langsmith, you'll build and refine scalable, reliable data pipelines and AI-driven solutions for our recruitment tech platform. Enhancing our AI capabilities, from data processing to document generation, while ensuring system robustness across diverse user scenarios., * AI Pipeline Development
          + Design and enhance AI pipelines to automatically extract and format output documents and structured data compatible with external systems.
          + Research new data extraction techniques to improve accuracy and automate data capture from various input documents.
          + Collaborate with integration teams to ensure smooth and reliable data transfer to ATS and other connected systems.
     * System Optimization for AI Stability and Robustness
          + Analyze and improve the underlying AI setup to enhance stability, adaptability, and overall output quality for diverse customer use cases.
          + Identify and address potential issues, especially regarding input variability, to maintain high system resilience.
          + Implement continuous testing and monitoring practices to optimize system performance and ensure reliable output generation.
     * Prompt Engineering for Customer Output
          + Develop and refine AI prompt templates to generate output documents in customer-specific formats, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
          + Work closely with product and engineering teams to optimize prompts for specific customer document standards.
          + Conduct testing and iterate on prompt designs to reduce manual adjustments and improve output quality.
     * Research and development
          + Lead R&D initiatives to advance Carv's AI capabilities, with a focus on emerging applications, including candidate engagement and workflow automation.
          + Explore new techniques and technologies that could improve or expand Carv's product offerings, from interaction-driven AI to predictive modeling.
          + Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prototype, test, and iterate on new AI-driven features that support both current and future customer needs.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and refining AI-driven solutions, prompt engineering, and developing applications around generative models. Key technologies like Langchain and Langsmith, along with responsibilities like RAG (implied by document generation and extraction) and prompt optimization, strongly align with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: This task involves designing and enhancing AI pipelines for data extraction, formatting, and compatibility with external systems, which directly relates to data engineering processes.

job_tasks.task: Research new data extraction techniques to improve accuracy and automate data capture from various input documents.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on improving data capture and automation, a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.task: Collaborate with integration teams to ensure smooth and reliable data transfer to ATS and other connected systems.
job_tasks.justification: This involves ensuring data transfer and integration with external systems, which is a software development concern for application integration.

job_tasks.task: System Optimization for AI Stability and Robustness
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on improving the AI setup for stability, adaptability, and output quality, along with continuous testing and monitoring, which are core MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.task: Analyze and improve the underlying AI setup to enhance stability, adaptability, and overall output quality for diverse customer use cases.
job_tasks.justification: Involves analyzing and improving AI systems for production readiness and performance, aligning with operations engineering.

job_tasks.task: Identify and address potential issues, especially regarding input variability, to maintain high system resilience.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on system resilience and issue resolution in a production context, a key MLOps function.

job_tasks.task: Implement continuous testing and monitoring practices to optimize system performance and ensure reliable output generation.
job_tasks.justification: Directly describes continuous testing and monitoring for system performance, a fundamental MLOps practice.
This task is centered on developing and refining AI prompts to generate specific outputs, which is a core aspect of working with generative models.

job_tasks.task: Develop and refine AI prompt templates to generate output documents in customer-specific formats, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
job_tasks.justification: Directly involves prompt engineering for generative AI output.

job_tasks.task: Work closely with product and engineering teams to optimize prompts for specific customer document standards.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding customer needs and translating them into technical requirements for prompt optimization, bridging business and technical aspects.

job_tasks.task: Conduct testing and iterate on prompt designs to reduce manual adjustments and improve output quality.
job_tasks.justification: Iterative prompt design and testing falls under model adaptation and fine-tuning for specific tasks.
This task involves leading R&D for AI capabilities, exploring new techniques and technologies, and prototyping new AI-driven features, which is central to modeling and generative AI advancements.

job_tasks.task: Lead R&D initiatives to advance Carv's AI capabilities, with a focus on emerging applications, including candidate engagement and workflow automation.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on advancing AI capabilities and exploring new applications, directly related to modeling research.

job_tasks.task: Explore new techniques and technologies that could improve or expand Carv's product offerings, from interaction-driven AI to predictive modeling.
job_tasks.justification: Involves researching and exploring new AI techniques, including generative and predictive modeling.

job_tasks.task: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prototype, test, and iterate on new AI-driven features that support both current and future customer needs.
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and iterating on new AI-driven features involves software development to bring new capabilities to life.

soft_skills.skill: Work closely with product and engineering teams
